sentences.english: Prosecutors however have asked the court to dismiss the Chirac case for lack of sufficient evidence.
sentences.chinese: 不过，由于缺乏足够的证据，检察官要求法院撤诉。

sentences.english: The solicitor attempted to have the charge dropped.
sentences.chinese: 初级律师试图使原告撤诉。

sentences.english: I want the charges dropped or the document goes public.
sentences.chinese: 别我希望你撤诉，否则这些文件将被公诸于众。

sentences.english: At the same time, the current rate of nolle prosequi in administration ease is increasing every year.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，我国行政案件撤诉率常年居高不下。

sentences.english: Small red face for money nolle prosequi, make Tian Ge is hit.
sentences.chinese: 小红为了钱而临场撤诉，使田歌受到打击。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
to conclude a case/to wind up
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
(of a defendant) to respond to a charge/to defend oneself
